snippet.title: Alan Wake 2 – Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
They're trapped in a horror story. The horror story wants them dead.

Play as the writer, Alan Wake, and the FBI agent, Saga Anderson. Explore two beautiful and terrifying realities, and solve a deadly mystery before it's too late. 

Alan Wake 2 releases October 27th on PlayStation 5, PC via the Epic Games Store, and Xbox Series X|S.

Monsters wear many faces.

Pre-purchase now at http://alanwake.com

The Alan Wake 2 gameplay trailer debuted in the PlayStation Showcase on 24th May 2023.

Follow Alan Wake:
Twitter: http://twitter.com/alanwake
Facebook: http://facebook.com/alanwake
Instagram: http://instagram.com/alanwakeofficial

#AlanWake #AlanWake2
